Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.20 Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika » 1.20.1 Ajjhattapada » 1.20.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika
Ajjhattapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
515.
1157Hetu ajjhatto dhammo hetussa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
516.
1158Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1159Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1160Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1161(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.20.2 Bahiddhāpada >>
